sentences.en: A bus rumbled along the road at the top of the path.
sentences.cn: 一辆公交车从小径尽头的路上缓慢地隆隆驶过。

sentences.en: a career path
sentences.cn: 职业发展道路

sentences.en: a path leading to the summer house
sentences.cn: 通往避暑别墅的小径

sentences.en: a well-worn path across the grass
sentences.cn: 草地上被踏出的小径

sentences.en: Before you is a well-worn path of beaten earth.
sentences.cn: 在你面前是一条踩出来的陈年小道。

sentences.en: Bessie was on the downhill path.
sentences.cn: 贝茜在下山的小路上。

sentences.en: Follow the path along the river to the bridge.
sentences.cn: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

sentences.en: He stepped without looking into the path of a reversing car.
sentences.cn: 一辆汽车正在倒车，他看都没看它倒向哪里就一脚迈了出去。

sentences.en: I saw them making their way, hand in hand, down the path.
sentences.cn: 我看到他们手拉手沿着小路往前走去。

sentences.en: I walked nervously up the garden path towards the front door.
sentences.cn: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.en: Political power has long been a well-trodden path to personal wealth.
sentences.cn: 拥有政治权力是敛财的惯常途径。

sentences.en: She did not notice the man until he moved into her path.
sentences.cn: 直到那个男人拦住她的去路，她才注意到他。

sentences.en: Stewart was trying to clear a path for the stretcher.
sentences.cn: 斯图尔特在努力给担架开路。

sentences.en: Stylistically, Weller is treading a similar path to that of Lenny Kravitz.
sentences.cn: 在风格上，韦勒与伦尼·克拉维茨走着相似的路子。

sentences.en: Take the metalled path running between the church and the fort.
sentences.cn: 走教堂和城堡之间的碎石小道。

sentences.en: The path angled downhill and northwards.
sentences.cn: 小路向山下伸展，然后向北延伸。

sentences.en: The path goes under the river by way of the tunnel.
sentences.cn: 这条通道经隧道从河下经过。

sentences.en: The path serves as an approach to the boat house.
sentences.cn: 这条小路通往船屋。

sentences.en: The path was dry and slithery from the drought.
sentences.cn: 小路因干旱变得又干又滑。

sentences.en: They dug trenches in their path and set booby traps.
sentences.cn: 他们在小路上挖深沟设饵雷。

sentences.en: We followed the path along the clifftops.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着悬崖顶的小径行进。

phrases.tran_cn: 关键路线方法，统筹方法
应力路径；应力轨；应力线路

trans.tran_cn: 小路，路线，道路，行动计划
trans.tran_en: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground
